position_description.description: End-point entity (no children) - likely data files or final results

Get aligned_reads_file with linked parent subject data

schema_summary.title: Aliquot
schema_summary.description: A portion of the original sample.

position_description.description: Intermediate entity in the data hierarchy - connects other entities

with_relationships.description: Get aliquot with linked parent sample data
Get aliquot with linked child aligned_reads_file data

usage_examples: Use aliquot as starting point for data exploration
Query aliquot fields: id, submitter_id, type
Access linked data via: aligned_reads_files, samples

schema_summary.title: Sample
schema_summary.description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products. In the case of contrived samples, it describes any material obtained from a normal donor.

position_description.description: Intermediate entity in the data hierarchy - connects other entities

with_relationships.description: Get sample with linked parent subject data
Get sample with linked child aliquot data
Get sample with parent subject and child aliquots with their aligned_reads_files

usage_examples: Use sample as starting point for data exploration
Query sample fields: id, submitter_id, type
Access linked data via: aliquots, subjects

schema_summary.title: Study
schema_summary.description: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

position_description.description: Top-level entity (no parents) - likely administrative or entry point

with_relationships.description: Get study with linked child subject data

usage_examples: Use study as starting point for data exploration
Query study fields: id, submitter_id, type

schema_summary.title: Subject
schema_summary.description: The collection of all data related to a specific subject in the context of a specific experiment.

position_description.description: Intermediate entity in the data hierarchy - connects other entities

with_relationships.description: Get subject with linked parent study data
Get subject with linked child aligned_reads_file data
Get subject with linked child sample data
Get subject with parent study and child samples with their aliquots
